languages.text: {n}Эльдар всерьез задумывается над вашими словами.{/n} "Мы лишились богатств Крудараха, но провидцы хранят в памяти немало знаний, ценность которых сложно описать примитивным языком мон-кай. Но если это поможет избежать кровопролития сейчас и после... Я {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}готов заключить соглашение{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар всерьез задумывается над вашими словами.{/n} "Мы лишились богатств Крудараха, но провидцы хранят в памяти немало знаний, ценность которых сложно описать примитивным языком мон-кай. Но если это поможет избежать кровопролития сейчас и после... Я готов заключить соглашение".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар всерьез задумывается над вашими словами.{/n} "Мы лишились богатств Крудараха, но провидцы хранят в памяти немало знаний, ценность которых сложно описать примитивным языком мон-кай. Но если это поможет избежать кровопролития сейчас и после... Я {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}готов заключить соглашение{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of seers holds knowledge the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid the bloodshed here as well as later... I am willing to make an agreement."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}El guerrero Aeldari sopesa tus palabras.{/n} «Perdimos los tesoros de Crudarach, pero aún conservamos los conocimientos memorizados por los videntes, y su valor es difícil de describir usando la primitiva lengua mon-keigh. Si eso contribuye a evitar un derramamiento de sangre tanto ahora como en el futuro... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}estoy dispuesto a llegar a un acuerdo{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero Aeldari sopesa tus palabras.{/n} «Perdimos los tesoros de Crudarach, pero aún conservamos los conocimientos memorizados por los videntes, y su valor es difícil de describir usando la primitiva lengua mon-keigh. Si eso contribuye a evitar un derramamiento de sangre tanto ahora como en el futuro... estoy dispuesto a llegar a un acuerdo».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}这位艾达灵族战士仔细考虑着你的话。{/n}“虽然我们失去了克鲁达拉赫的宝藏，但我们先知的记忆中还保存着许多珍贵的知识，价值难以用猴子的原始语言描述。如果交出这些知识，可以避免这次与以后的流血事件……那我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}愿意达成协议{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位艾达灵族战士仔细考虑着你的话。{/n}“虽然我们失去了克鲁达拉赫的宝藏，但我们先知的记忆中还保存着许多珍贵的知识，价值难以用猴子的原始语言描述。如果交出这些知识，可以避免这次与以后的流血事件……那我愿意达成协议。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier aeldari réfléchit à votre proposition.{/n} « Nous avons perdu les trésors de Crudarach, mais la mémoire des Grands Prophètes renferme des connaissances dont la valeur est difficile à exprimer dans la langue primitive des mon-keigh. Si cela permet d'éviter un bain de sang aujourd'hui ou demain... je suis {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}prêt à trouver un arrangement{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier aeldari réfléchit à votre proposition.{/n} « Nous avons perdu les trésors de Crudarach, mais la mémoire des prophètes renferme des connaissances dont la valeur est difficile à exprimer dans la langue primitive des mon-keigh. Si cela permet d'éviter un bain de sang aujourd'hui ou demain... je suis prêt à trouver un arrangement. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}アエルダリの戦士はあなたの言葉を考えている。{/n}「我々はクルダラの宝を失ったが、先見司たちの記憶には知識がある。その価値は、モン＝ケイの原始的な言葉では表現し難いものだ。もしこれが、ここでの流血や後の流血を避けるのに役立つなら… 喜んで{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}協定を結ぼう{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリの戦士はあなたの言葉を考えている。{/n}「我々はクルダラの宝を失ったが、先見司たちの記憶には知識がある。その価値は、モン＝ケイの原始的な言葉では表現し難いものだ。もしこれが、ここでの流血や後の流血を避けるのに役立つなら… 喜んで{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}協定を結ぼう{/d}」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari-Krieger denkt über deine Worte nach.{/n} "Wir haben die Schätze von Crudarach verloren, doch das Gedächtnis der Seher enthält Wissen, dessen Wert in der primitiven Sprache der Chem-Pan-Sey schwer zu beschreiben ist. Wenn das hilft, hier sowie später Blutvergießen zu verhindern ... Dann bin ich {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}bereit, eine Vereinbarung zu treffen{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari-Krieger denkt über deine Worte nach.{/n} "Wir haben die Schätze von Crudarach verloren, doch das Gedächtnis der Seher enthält Wissen, dessen Wert in der primitiven Sprache der Chem-Pan-Sey schwer zu beschreiben ist. Wenn das hilft, hier sowie später Blutvergießen zu verhindern ... Dann bin ich bereit, eine Vereinbarung zu treffen."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Aeldari savaşçısı, sözlerini değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın hazinelerini kaybettik ancak Ötesezenlerin hafızaları, mon-keighlerin ilkel dilinde değerini anlatması bir hayli güç irfanla doludur. Hem burada hem de gelecekte yaşanabilecek katliamın önüne geçmeye yardımcı olacaksa... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}Anlaşmaya varmaya razıyım{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior considers your words.{/n} "We lost the treasures of Crudarach, but the memory of the Farseers holds knowledge, the value of which is difficult to describe in the mon-keigh's primitive tongue. If this helps to avoid bloodshed here as well as later... I am {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}willing to come to an agreement{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari savaşçısı, sözlerini değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın hazinelerini kaybettik ancak Ötesezenlerin hafızaları, mon-keighlerin ilkel dilinde değerini anlatması bir hayli güç irfanla doludur. Hem burada hem de gelecekte yaşanabilecek katliamın önüne geçmede yardımcı olacaksa... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}Anlaşmaya varmaya razıyım{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
